participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

pbp_athletes.Description: Are athletes | 1=None or almost none;  2=A few;  3=Half;  4=Most;  5=All or almost all;  999=Don't know

pbp_skip_school.Description: Have skipped school | 1=None or almost none;  2=A few;  3=Half;  4=Most;  5=All or almost all;  999=Don't know

pbp_church.Description: Go to church once a month or more often | 1=None or almost none;  2=A few;  3=Half;  4=Most;  5=All or almost all;  999=Don't know

pbp_suspended.Description: Have been suspended from school | 1=None or almost none;  2=A few;  3=Half;  4=Most;  5=All or almost all;  999=Don't know

pbp_good_student.Description: Are excellent students (GPA 3.5 [B+] or higher) | 1=None or almost none;  2=A few;  3=Half;  4=Most;  5=All or almost all;  999=Don't know

pbp_shoplifted.Description: Have shoplifted occasionally | 1=None or almost none;  2=A few;  3=Half;  4=Most;  5=All or almost all;  999=Don't know

pbp_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1=RA-Administered ; 2=Youth Self-Administered ; 3=Combination [event_name_number] > '21'

pbp_ss_prosocial_peers.Description: Involvement with Prosocial Peers sum(pbp_athletes, pbp_church, pbp_good_student) Validation: Minimum of two items must be answered

pbp_ss_rule_break.Description: Involvement with Rule Breaking/Delinquent Peers  sum(pbp_skip_school, pbp_suspended, pbp_shop_lifted) Validation: Minimum of two items must be answered

pbp_ss_rule_break_nm.Description: Involvement with Rule Breaking/Delinquent Peers Missing

pbp_ss_rule_break_nt.Description: Involvement with Rule Breaking/Delinquent Peers Total
